scripts.build: webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.prod.js --progress && cp -vr static/* dist/ && mv -v dist/*.js dist/js/
scripts.push-sandbox: NODE_ENV=sandbox webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.prod.js --progress && cp -vr static/* dist/ && mv -v dist/*.js dist/js/ && mv -v dist/index.prod.html dist/index.html && mv -v dist/js/app.min.js dist/js/app.$(date '+%-d%-m%Y%-H%-M').js && sed -i -e "s/app.min.js/app.$(date '+%-d%-m%Y%-H%-M').js/g" dist/index.html && s3cmd sync -v dist/* s3://studentapp-sandbox.hellothinkster.com
scripts.push-viasandbox: isViaAfrika=true NODE_ENV=sandbox webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.prod.js --progress && cp -vr static/* dist/ && mv -v dist/*.js dist/js/ && mv -v dist/index.prod.html dist/index.html && s3cmd sync -v dist/* s3://studentapp-sandbox.tabtor.com
scripts.push-alpha: NODE_ENV=alpha webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.prod.js --progress && cp -vr static/* dist/ && mv -v dist/*.js dist/js/ && mv -v dist/index.prod.html dist/index.html && mv -v dist/js/app.min.js dist/js/app.$(date '+%-d%-m%Y%-H%-M').js && sed -i -e "s/app.min.js/app.$(date '+%-d%-m%Y%-H%-M').js/g" dist/index.html && s3cmd sync -v dist/* s3://studentapp-alpha.hellothinkster.com
scripts.push-prod: NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.prod.js --progress && cp -vr static/* dist/ && mv -v dist/*.js dist/js/ && mv -v dist/index.prod.html dist/index.html && mv -v dist/js/app.min.js dist/js/app.$(date '+%-d%-m%Y%-H%-M').js && sed -i -e "s/app.min.js/app.$(date '+%-d%-m%Y%-H%-M').js/g" dist/index.html && s3cmd sync -v dist/* s3://studentapp.hellothinkster.com
scripts.push-viaprod: isViaAfrika=true NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.prod.js --progress && cp -vr static/* dist/ && mv -v dist/*.js dist/js/ && mv -v dist/index.prod.html dist/index.html && mv -v dist/js/app.min.js dist/js/app.$(date '+%-d%-m%Y%-H%-M').js && sed -i -e "s/app.min.js/app.$(date '+%-d%-m%Y%-H%-M').js/g" dist/index.html && s3cmd sync -v dist/* s3://studentapp.tabtor.com
